In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the solution:

```julia
function wrap_string(s, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    result = ""
    line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(line * " $word") > text_width
            result *= "$line\n"
            line = ""
        elseif !isempty(line)
            line *= " "
        end
        
        line *= word
    end
    
    return result * line
end
```

An example of usage:

```julia
print(wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam ultricies nunc id massa mollis viverra.", 20))
```
